      • setBlogDao

        public void setBlogDao(com.mydomain.dao.BlogDao blogDao)

      • getBlog

        @GET
@Path(value="/{param}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public com.mydomain.model.dto.BlogDTO getBlog(@PathParam(value="param")
                                                       java.lang.String id)
        Description :
        This API is used to get User Blog of the id given
        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/id

        id - id value of blog. This is unique value created while blog is created

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0

        Sample response:
        {

        "title": "4th post",

        "content": "This is 4 post",

        "tags": null,

        "postedDate": 1462204072139,

        "postedUserName": "Hari",

        "postedUserId": "5722ffa441fbd6d042b07202",

        "id": "572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0"

        }

        Parameters:
        String - id - id of the blog requested
        Returns:
        Blog that mataches the id given in JSON format

      • getBlogs

        @GET
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getBlogs()
        Description :
        This API is used to get all User Blogs

        Sorted by posted date; latest post shall in the top

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog

        Sample response:
        {

        "title": "4th post",

        "content": "This is 4 post",

        "tags": null,

        "postedDate": 1462204072139,

        "postedUserName": "Hari",

        "postedUserId": "5722ffa441fbd6d042b07202",

        "id": "572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0"

        }

        Parameters:
        None -
        Returns:
        All user Blogs in JSON format

      • getCount

        @GET
@Path(value="/count")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public com.mydomain.model.dto.Count getCount()
        Description :
        This API is used to get count of all User Blogs

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/count

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/count

        Sample response:
        {

        "count": 4

        }

        Parameters:
        None -
        Returns:
        Count of all user Blogs in JSON format

      • doSearch

        @GET
@Path(value="/search")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response doSearch(@QueryParam(value="searchstring")
                                                   java.lang.String searchstring,
                                                   @DefaultValue(value="0")@QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                   int offset,
                                                   @DefaultValue(value="2")@QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                   int limit)
        Description :
        Search in all User Blogs

        Sorted by posted date; latest post shall in the top

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/search?searchstring=searchstringvalue&offset=offsetvalue&limit=limitvalue

        searchstringvalue - search string

        offsetvalue (optional) - skip offset of search result list; default value : 0

        limitvalue (optional) - page size of search result list; default value : 2

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/search?searchstring="post"&offset=0&limit=5

        Sample response:
        {

        "title": "4th post",

        "content": "This is 4 post",

        "tags": null,

        "postedDate": 1462204072139,

        "postedUserName": "Hari",

        "postedUserId": "5722ffa441fbd6d042b07202",

        "id": "572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0"

        }

        Parameters:
        None -
        Returns:
        Search result of user Blogs in JSON format

      • getSearchCount

        @GET
@Path(value="/searchcount")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public com.mydomain.model.dto.Count getSearchCount(@QueryParam(value="searchstring")
                                                            java.lang.String searchstring)
        Description :
        Count of Search in all User Blogs

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/search?searchstring=searchstringvalue

        searchstringvalue - search string

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/search?searchstring="post"

        Sample response:
        {

        "count": 3

        }

        Parameters:
        None -
        Returns:
        Search result count of user Blogs in JSON format

      • createBlog

        @POST
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public void createBlog(com.mydomain.model.dto.BlogDTO blogsDto)
        Description :
        This API creates the blog

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/blogdetails

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog

        Param :

        {

        "title": "4th post",

        "content": "This is 4 post",

        "tags": null,

        "postedDate": 1462204072139,

        "postedUserName": "Hari",

        "postedUserId": "5722ffa441fbd6d042b07202"

        }

        Parameters:
        User - blog in JSON format

      • updateBlog

        @PUT
@Consumes(value="application/json")
public void updateBlog(com.mydomain.model.dto.BlogDTO blogsDto)
        Description :
        This API updates the blog given

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/update/blogdetails

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/update

        Param :

        {

        "title": "4th post",

        "content": "This is 4 post",

        "tags": null,

        "postedDate": 1462204072139,

        "postedUserName": "Hari",

        "postedUserId": "5722ffa441fbd6d042b07202",

        "id": "572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0"

        }

        Parameters:
        User - blog in JSON format

      • deleteBlog

        @DELETE
@Path(value="/{param}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public void deleteBlog(@PathParam(value="param")
                                   java.lang.String id)
        Description :
        This API deletes the blog of the id given

        Rest URL :
        http://hostname:port/CMADDemo/rest/blog/delete/id

        Example url:
        http://localhost:8080/CMADDemo/rest/blog/delete/572776a8f63b961ab4aa6fe0

        Parameters:
        String - id - id of the blog requested
